0000001010111100 0101111011111000 1 -> sum: 0110000110110101, cout: 0

1100111001101101 1110001111011001 0 -> sum: 1011001001000110, cout: 1
1101010000010111 0010111000001111 0 -> sum: 0000001000100110, cout: 1
